entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet pack -o` does not seem to work #29979
  • Dependent .deps.json file not published when a package with PrivateAssets=all is included #29974
  • It_builds_successfully_when_targeting_net_framework test wants to compile a .NETCoreApp template on .NET Framework #29968

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Runtime ILLink package on SDK #29983
    Area-ILLink, DO NOT MERGE
  • Add support for EnableRequestDelegateGenerator flag #29982
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29980
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29976
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Stable branding for 7.0.200 GA release #29942
    Area-Infrastructure
  • revert part of #29916 #29966
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29945
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29940
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix an issue with delegate declaration. Fix an issue with Simplifier and removing nullability. #29961
    Area-GenAPI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2089678 #29963
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce Dependabot for updating the same dependencies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2089789 #29964
    Area-Infrastructure
